author: WColton
title: Re: Busta Rhymes, Katy Perry get political at the #Grammys [video]
text:
Busta Rhymes, Katy Perry get political at the #Grammys [video] Posted at 11:00 pm on February 12, 2017 by Greg P. 
So, this just happend at the Grammys: "I want to thank president agent Orange for your unsuccessful attempt at the Muslim ban." 
— BuzzFeedEntmnt (@BuzzFeedEnt) February 13, 2017 
Video here: So Busta just called Trump "President Agent Orange," hit at his "Muslim ban," broke thru his wall & ended with a call to " #resist " #GRAMMYs pic.twitter.com/52oGcuHdPv 
— Bradd Jaffy (@BraddJaffy) February 13, 2017 Trending
